::Shredder::

Shredder nearly loses his balance as the three Destrons open fire on the 
ship, making it shake. He swears, checking his scanner. There were only three 
attackers, not too many to deal with.

"Let's go!" he says to the Destrocons and Mantella, "We've got bots to slag!"

He pulls out both chainguns, running for the exit.
